name: Fat Kats
description:
FatKats is a local-multiplayer game developed for GranadaJam, 21-23 October 2016. Two kitties, Luffy and Pastelito, are hungry in the streets of Japan. Each player wil control one of them in order to prevent death from starvation. So take the food & hit your oponent to survive.

Player 1 (Luffy):
A - left
D - right
W - jump
S - dash your opponent

Player 2 (Pastelito):
Left arrow - left
Right arrow - right
Up arrow - jump
Down arrow - dash your opponent

Development Team:
Laura del Pino Díaz
Candelaria María Dorta Núñez
Juan Carlos Guerrero de Mora
José Carlos Rodríguez Cortés
Raquel Sánchez Grosso
